description:
A prophecy claims that the Great Lord of Terror is going to descend upon the Earth in the year 1999 and cause Armageddon.  Well, it`s five years late, but the Great Lord of Terror is finally here -- the form of a cute girl named Mois!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La mission de Donaré / Tamama est jaloux !
Moa Hajimete no Chikyuu Hakai de Arimasu / Tamama VS Moa Kekka wa Tamama no Make de Arimasu
モアはじめての地球破壊 であります / タママ VS モア結果はタママの負け であります
